entry.title: Floating rate bonds and term structure of interest rates
entry.content:
Linear pricing(线性定价)

Theorem (Linear Pricing) Suppose there is no arbitrage. Suppose also

  • Price of cash flow \(C _{A}\) is \(p_{A}\)
  • Price of cash flow \(c _{B}\) is \(p_{B}\)

Then the price of cash flow that pays \(c = c _{A}+ c _{B}\) must be \(p_{A}+p_{B}\).

不满足改定理的定价策略必然会形成套利

Floating interest rates(浮动利率)

实际上,利率是一个随机量,随着时间而波动.

作出以下定义 - Let \(r_{k}\) denote the per period interest rate over period \([k, k+1)\) - The exact value of \(r_{k}\) becomes known only at time \(k\) - 1-period loans issued in period \(k\) to be repaid in period \(k+1\) are charged \(r_{k}\) - Cash flow of floating rate bond - coupon payment at time \(k: r_{k-1} F\)(使用上一期的利率) - face value at time \(n: F\) - Goal: Compute the arbitrage-free price \(P_{f}\) of the floating rate bond - Split up the cash flows of floating rate bond into simpler cash flows - \(p_{k}=\) Price of contract paying \(r_{k-1} F\) at time \(k\) - \(P=\) Price of Principal \(F\) at time \(n=\frac{F}{(1+r)^{n}}\) Price of floating rate bond \(P_{f}=P+\sum_{k=1}^{n} p_{k}\) #### Price of contract that pays \(r_{k-1} F\) at time \(k\) Cash flow at time \(k\) \[\begin{aligned}c_{k} &=r_{k-1} F-\alpha\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k-1}\left(1+r_{k-1}\right)+\alpha\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k} \\&=\underbrace{\left(F-\alpha\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k-1}\right) r_{k-1}}_{\text {random }}+\underbrace{\alpha r_{0}\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k-1}}_{\text {deterministic }}\end{aligned}\] Set \(\alpha=\frac{F}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{(k-1)}}\). Then the random term is \(0 .\) Net cash flow is now deterministic \(\ldots c_{k}=\alpha r_{0}\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k-1}=F r_{0}\)

Price of floating rate bond

\[\begin{aligned}P_{f} &=\frac{F}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{n}}+\sum_{k=1}^{n} p_{k} \\&=\frac{F}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{n}}+\sum_{k=1}^{n} \frac{F r_{0}}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k}} \\&=\frac{F}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{n}}+\frac{F r_{0}}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)} \sum_{k=1}^{n} \frac{1}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{k-1}} \\&=\frac{F}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{n}}+\frac{F r_{0}}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)} \cdot \frac{1-\frac{1}{\left(1+r_{0}\right)^{n}}}{1-\frac{1}{1+r_{0}}} \\&=F\end{aligned}\] The price \(P_{f}\) of a floating rate bond is equal to its face value \(F\)

浮动利率的情况下,无套利的价格为面值

entry.title: Interest rates and fixed income instruments
entry.content:
利率收益

  • 单利[[no-arbitrage(无套利原则)#^697b0a]]
  • 复利[[no-arbitrage(无套利原则)#^38a586]]
  • 连续复利[[no-arbitrage(无套利原则)#^52ad8d]]

现值(Present value)

Present Value (PV) assuming interest rate \(r\) per period \[P V( c ; r)=c_{0}+\frac{c_{1}}{(1+r)}+\frac{c_{2}}{(1+r)^{2}}+\ldots \frac{c_{N}}{(1+r)^{N}}=\sum_{k=0}^{N} \frac{c_{k}}{(1+r)^{k}}\]

我们对合约价值做无套利假设,有且仅当合约价值等于现值时无套利实现(这是借贷利率相同的情况)

Different lending and borrowing rate

Can lend at rate \(r_{L}\) and borrow rate at rate \(r_{B}: r_{L} \leq r_{B}\) - Portfolio: buy contract, and borrow \(\frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{B}\right)^{k}}\) for \(k\) years, \(k=1, \ldots, N\) - Cash flow in year \(k: c_{k}-\frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{B}\right)^{k}}\left(1+r_{B}\right)^{k}=0\) for \(k \geq 1\) - No-arbitrage: price \(=p-c_{0}-\sum_{k=1}^{N} \frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{B}\right)^{k}} \geq 0\) - Lower bound on price \(p \geq P V\left( c ; r_{B}\right)\) - Portfolio: sell contract, and lend \(\frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{L}\right)^{k}}\) for \(k\) years, \(k=1, \ldots, N\) Cash flow in year \(k:-c_{k}+\frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{L}\right)^{k}}\left(1+r_{L}\right)^{k}=0\) for \(k \geq 1\) - No-arbitrage: price \(=-p+c_{0}+\sum_{k=1}^{N} \frac{c_{k}}{\left(1+r_{L}\right)^{k}} \geq 0\) - Upper bound on price \(p \leq P V\left( c ; r_{L}\right)\) - Bounds on the price \(P V\left( c ; r_{B}\right) \leq p \leq P V\left( c ; r_{L}\right)\)

满足无套利的情况下实现盈利

Fix income securities(固定收入工具)

不是无风险的,还需要承担违约风险.通胀风险和市场风险

永续(Perpetuity)

[[基本概念#^ef1a7e]]

\(\begin{aligned} c_{k}=A \text { for all } k \geq 1 & \\ p=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{A}{(1+r)^{k}}=\frac{A}{r} \end{aligned}\) > 可以看出永续合约是没有交割日期的,合约在平仓前是永久持有的(\(k趋向\infty\))

年金(Annuity)

\(c_{k}=A\) for all \(k=1, \ldots, n\) \[\begin{array}{l}\text { Annuity }=\text { Perpetuity }-\text { Perpetuity starting in year } n+1 \\\text { Price } p=\frac{A}{r}-\frac{1}{(1+r)^{n}} \cdot \frac{A}{r}=\frac{A}{r}\left(1-\frac{1}{(1+r)^{n}}\right)\end{array}\]

Bonds(债券)

  • Face value \(F\) : usually 100 or 1000
  • Coupon rate \(\alpha\) : pays \(c=\alpha F / 2\) every six months
  • Maturity \(T:\) Date of the payment of the face value and the last coupon
  • Price \(P\)
  • Quality rating: S&P Ratings \(AAA , AA , BBB , BB , CCC , CC\)

价格的制定

\[P=\sum_{k=1}^{2 T} \frac{c}{(1+\lambda / 2)^{k}}+\frac{F}{(1+\lambda / 2)^{2 T}}\]

entry.title: 无套利
entry.content:
定义

  • 套利(arbitrage) 定义: 买入一定的资产并随机卖出(或者相反),利用差价获利的行为
  • 无套利(no-arbitrage)假设,是金融产品和衍生品定价理论的基本假设——由于市场的流动性和信息透明性,市场熵不存在套利机会,世界上么有免费的午餐!
  • 单利(simple interest): An amount \(A\) invested for \(n\) periods at a simple interest rate of \(r\) per period is worth \(A(1+n \cdot r)\) at maturity. ^697b0a
  • 复利(compound interest): An amount \(A\) invested for \(n\) periods at a compound interest rate of \(r\) per period is worth \(A(1+r)^{n}\) at maturity. ^38a586
  • 连续复利(Continuous compounding):Continuous compounding corresponds to the situation where the length of the compounding period goes to zero. Therefore, an amount \(A\) invested for \(y\) years is worth \(\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} A(1+r / n)^{y n}=A e^{r y}\) at maturity. ^52ad8d
    • 将时间序列的间隔不断逼近0

无套利定价策略

利用无套利定价理论为金融产品定价时，常常构造两个相反的投资组合（portfolio），模拟同一个交易的双方，金融产品的定价使得双方均不可能在交易中套利

对于一份合约,我们定义 - Pay price \(p\) at time \(t=0\) - Receive \(c_{k}\) at time \(t=k, k=1, \ldots, T\)

clash flow \(c_k\) 非负 对于这份合约,存在两种无套利的情况

  • Weak No-Arbitrage: \(c_{k} \geq 0\) for all \(k \geq 1 \Rightarrow p \geq 0\)
    • 弱无套利表示合约未来的收入可以为0
  • Strong No-Arbitrage: \(c_{k} \geq 0\) for all \(k \geq 1\) and \(c_{\ell}>0\) for some \(\ell \Rightarrow p>0\)
    • 强无套利表示未来合约的收入不能为0(天下没有免费的午餐)

根据无套利原则,我们进行定价 - Construct the following portfolio(投资组合)(对于买方) - Buy the contract at price \(p\) - Borrow \(A /(1+r)\) at interest rate \(r\) - Construct the following portfolio(对于卖方) - Sell the contract at price \(p\) - Lend \(A /(1+r)\) at interest rate \(r\)

为了实现双方的无套利,定价必须为\(P = A/(1+r)\)
